“Hi, my name is Roy.” — Now that just sounds stupid.
Mar 29

RSVP: Medium’s First Annual Member / Non-Member Summit

Sponsored by Tiger Balm

Date/Time: April 1 / 8:30AM CST

Representing the Members: Gloria Garcia-Neiman-Marcus (vice-master)

Representing the Non-Members: Neil (party whip)

Agenda:

  1. What to Call “Members”

suggested titles -

  • greenies (courtesy of Aura Wilming)
  • five-lighters
  • wall climbers
  • the chosen
  • E.T.s (Ev’s third Tesla)
  • green-gos
  • minties (green and refreshing)
  • medium-on-high
  • pupils (cuz don’t the green brackets look like eyelids?)
  • bracketeers
  • parentheticals (cuz they also look like parentheses)
  • doin’ the eyes wide shut

2. What to call “Non-Members”

suggested titles -

  • non-members

Meeting Location:

  • Medium
  • Humor
  • Satire
  • Pancakes

  • Roy Schlegel

    “Hi, my name is Roy.” — Now that just sounds stupid.
